mapper.sql: id, bill_code, order_id, legal_person_id, supplier_id, amount, cid, remarks, status
mapper.select: select t.id,t.bill_code,t.order_id,t.legal_person_id,t.supplier_id,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks,t.status,t.create_time,t.payer_id,t.payment_time,t.voucher_url,t.account_payable_id, t1.order_no, t2.legal_entity, t3.company_name supplierName from pay_bill_master t left join order_info t1 on t1.id = t.order_id left join legal_person t2 on t2.id = t.legal_person_id left join supplier_info t3 on t3.id = t.supplier_id where 1=1 and t.id = 1 and t.id = #{id}

select t.id,t.bill_code,t.order_id,t.legal_person_id,t.supplier_id,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks,t.status,t.create_time,t.payer_id,t.payment_time,t.voucher_url,t.account_payable_id, t1.order_no, t2.legal_entity, t3.company_name supplierName, t4.name payerName from pay_bill_master t left join order_info t1 on t1.id = t.order_id left join legal_person t2 on t2.id = t.legal_person_id left join supplier_info t3 on t3.id = t.supplier_id left join system_user t4 on t4.id = t.payer_id where t.account_payable_id = #{accountPayableId}

select t.id,t.bill_code,t.order_id,t.legal_person_id,t.supplier_id,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks,t.status,t.create_time,t.payer_id,t.payment_time,t.voucher_url,t.account_payable_id from pay_bill_master t where 1=1 and t.account_payable_id is not null and t.create_time >= #{firstday, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time <= #{lastDay, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select t.id,t.bill_code,t.order_id,t.legal_person_id,t.supplier_id,t.amount,t.cid,t.remarks,t.status,t.create_time,t.payer_id,t.payment_time,t.voucher_url,t.account_payable_id, t1.order_no, t2.legal_entity, t3.company_name supplierName, t4.currency_code,t4.currency_name, CONCAT(t.amount, ' ', t4.currency_name) amountFormat from pay_bill_master t left join order_info t1 on t1.id = t.order_id left join legal_person t2 on t2.id = t.legal_person_id left join supplier_info t3 on t3.id = t.supplier_id left join currency_info t4 on t4.id = t.cid where 1=1 and t.status = 0 and t.account_payable_id = #{accountPayableId}
